thread.title: Ground News - Attack on Cologne Cathedral planned for New Year's Eve — suspect had contact with trio of Islamists
thread.title_full: Ground News - Attack on Cologne Cathedral planned for New Year's Eve — suspect had contact with trio of Islamists

author: focus.de
title: Ground News - Attack on Cologne Cathedral planned for New Year's Eve — suspect had contact with trio of Islamists
text:
Summary by focus.de New investigative findings on the planned Islamist attack on Cologne Cathedral on New Year 's Eve: According to information from FOCUS online, a Tajik suspect who spent two weeks in police custody is said to have had contact with a trio of terrorists from Vienna. By FOCUS online reporter Axel Spilcker Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
